caption.p: Important steps of the phenylpropanoid pathway in the formation of methyleugenol, safrole, and myristicin and the formation of toluene. Where CAD = cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase, CAAT = coniferyl alcohol acyl transferase, PER25 = peroxidase 25, IGS = isoeugenol synthase, EGS = eugenol synthase, EOMT = eugenol O-methyltransferase, and CYP719As = cytochrome-450719As. Red colour shows the upregulation of DEGs in Asarum leaves in full sunlight conditions
